body:
Hi, Im Nick/Gimq and I dont know why my ban appeal was denied because I ban evaded again...
Like wtf why would I ban evade if I posted and appeal...?
Sr Staff just tell me why u think I ban evaded...

title: Denied Appeal for Ban Evading again?!??!

replies.body: Well my brother who played avicus got banned and we use the same internet so is that why? btw his IGN was FireDisaster.

Well, same internet router = same IP address.

Feel free to explain that to the staff on the Appeal board, although.
